parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page defaults to 1 and will return the first 1000 records. Page 2 (?page=2) will return the next 1000 records, etc.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Parameter can be used to conditionally return records based on the status of the Sales Order. Two statuses can be passed to find all sales orders between the first and second status. For example ?Status=3,95 will return all Sales Orders between the status 3 and 95

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: Parameter can be used to conditionally return records based on the date of the Sales Order. The format of the date must be yyyy-mm-dd. Two dates can be passed to find all sales orders between the first and second date. For example ?Date=2019-01-01,2019-01-31 will return all Sales Orders between the dates 2019-01-01 and 2019-01-31
